trans:
The ideal Pizzaiolo | Pastachef has a passion for preparing delicious and high-quality food using fresh ingredients. Working at Bella di Nonno mainly means pizza, pasta and even more pizza! You should not be afraid to roll up your sleeves sometimes, but you get a lot of fun in return. Our team consists of young, enthusiastic people with a great sense of responsibility. Our kitchen prepares culinary wood oven pizzas. Beautiful Italian pasta and salads should of course not be missed.
Watch the video below to see what we have to offer you as a Pizzaiolo | Pasta chef :)
https://www.tiktok.com/@unapologeticallychef/video/7340683735987146017
Job requirements
What are you going to do
Prep / mise en place with fresh products
Spread out and invest dough balls
Bake pizzas in a Neapolitan way
Finish / cut / pack pizzas
Extract orders and clear stock
Prepare and present all other dishes
We ask you:
We are looking for kitchen employees of all levels
